summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test. It is crucial to investigate and optimize this page to ensure a better user experience. Recommendation: Analyze the page's content, resources, and scripts to identify bottlenecks and improve loading time.

issues.message: The "How It Works" page failed the performance test. It is crucial to investigate and optimize this page to ensure a better user experience. Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Analyze the page's content, resources, and scripts to identify bottlenecks and improve loading time.

issues.message: The homepage has a higher load time compared to the other pages. Although it passed the test, it can still be optimized for better performance. Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Consider optimizing images, minifying CSS and JavaScript files, and leveraging browser caching.

insights: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) metric is relatively low across all pages, indicating that the server response time is good.
First Contentful Paint (FCP) is consistent across all pages, meaning that the initial view of the page is rendered quickly.
The blog page has the lowest load time, TTFB, and FCP among the pages that passed the test. This could serve as a benchmark for optimizing the other pages.
It is essential to address the critical issue on the "How It Works" page to ensure overall web performance and user satisfaction.
